name: Stock Orders Test
description: Test case for retrieving stock order history through agent interaction

parts.text: Show me my recent stock order history.

Here is your recent stock order history:

**Recent Stock Orders:**

*

**Order Status Legend:**
- **Filled:** Order completed successfully
- **Cancelled:** Order was cancelled
- **Pending:** Order is still active
- **Rejected:** Order was rejected

This shows your actual trading history from your Robinhood account.
